title: MrGunner2013
author: MrGunner2013
content: What do you all think about “Bitcoin magazines”  are they cool / good collectibles and a piece of history or over priced hype? Issues 1-3 can be priced at 1500-6000 probably not selling but at least they are trying lol

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: I know one of the issues has a Casascius ad in it...  so yes, would def be a part of btc collectible history.Some of the #1 issues have definitely sold in that rangeEDIT: It is issue #17 (Dec 2013)

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Anyone have any idea on how many #1s were printed ?Edit  - still some for sale at https://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/collections/magazines/products/bitcoin-magazine-issue-1-may-2012BITCOIN MAGAZINE ISSUE 1$ 2,100.00

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Some of the most valuable and rare pieces, outside of the Bitcoin Mag issues:- The Economist - Get Ready for a World Currency - 1/88- The Times - Genesis Block - 1/09- Bloomberg Businessweek - Bitcoin Dreams - 3/14- Newsweek - Bitcoin's Face - 3/14This Forum posting is a great reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.0

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Search around. I think there  are probably folks on these forums that still have access to hundreds of sets. I used to sell complete sets for around $200 I think. While they are hard to find at decent prices, I think that people who have lots of them would say they’re difficult to sell. Putting up a WTB post might not be a bad idea. You never know who will see it.

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on May 09, 2023, 07:51:39 PMSearch around. I think there  are probably folks on these forums that still have access to hundreds of sets. I used to sell complete sets for around $200 I think. While they are hard to find at decent prices, I think that people who have lots of them would say they’re difficult to sell. Putting up a WTB post might not be a bad idea. You never know who will see it. 200$ for a complete set?   If anyone is selling a set for this much, sent me a PM

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Iced on May 10, 2023, 09:33:27 PM200$ for a complete set?   If anyone is selling a set for this much, sent me a PMMm... yeah.. probably not that easy, considering issue #1 is $2100 for retail right now... https://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/products/bitcoin-magazine-issue-1-may-2012Good luck though, I always dream of finding a pile at a garage sale where they don't know the value, but that will likely never happen either!

comments.author: vizique
comments.body: A Full set (if bought individually) would be $19055 -  I have 9 sets of 2 - 22 available - Retail they would be $16955 a setAm open to offers on sets and maybe single issues?CheersViz
